archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Sending Module
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Objective: Email campaigns’ scheduling and distribution
Key Features: - Campaign scheduling and sending - HTML redactor for Email Copy preparation - Collecting bounces and syncing them with the MainDB - Engagements and bounces monitoring - Live email validation processing - Infrastructure Managers’ dashboard - Email Copy Uploader - Bulk segments sending & scheduling - Calendar Invites
